channel.title: GER:BMW on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GER:BMW on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Key BMW Dealer in China Expects to ‘Suffer’ Before Rebound
item.description: Sime Darby Bhd., one of the main dealerships in China for BMW AG, expects things to get worse before sales of the German luxury vehicles rebound in the cut-throat Chinese auto market.

item.title: BMW to Meet Investors as Weak China Sales Overshadow EV Strategy
item.description: BMW AG executives will likely face tough questions this week about worsening sales in China and the impact of global trade tensions when they sit down with investors and analysts in Munich.
